trans-unit.source: Displays links to table actions such as edit, delete, and insert.
trans-unit.target: 显示指向表操作（如编辑、删除和插入）的链接。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink> control creates links that are based on the table actions that are enabled by Dynamic Data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink>控件创建基于启用的动态数据的表操作的链接。

trans-unit.source: These actions are defined in the Global.asax file as default routing rules.
trans-unit.target: 在 Global.asax 文件中，这些操作被定义为默认路由规则。

trans-unit.source: The rules are associated with default page templates such as Edit.aspx, List.aspx, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 规则是与 Edit.aspx、 List.aspx，等的默认页模板相关联。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the link, a page is displayed that enables the user to perform the action that is specified by the link.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击链接时，会显示页面，使用户能够执行指定的链接的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink> control enables you to create the following links:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink>控制，你可以创建以下链接：

trans-unit.source: Table row data-bound links, which are for data-item specific action links such as "Edit" and "Details".
trans-unit.target: 表行数据绑定链接，适用于数据项特定的操作链接，例如"编辑"和"详细信息"。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Data infers the table and the primary key from the current row.
trans-unit.target: 动态数据推断表和当前行的主键。

trans-unit.source: An example of these links is in the Edit.aspx page of a Dynamic Data Web site.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接的一个示例是一个动态数据网站的 Edit.aspx 页中。

trans-unit.source: Links to <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> objects, which are specific action links such as "List" and "Insert" that in turn point to objects such as tables.
trans-unit.target: 链接到<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable>对象，后者是特定的操作链接，例如"List"和"插入"反过来指向如表的对象。

trans-unit.source: An example of these links is in the Default.aspx page of a Dynamic Data Web site.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接的一个示例是一个动态数据网站的 Default.aspx 页中。

trans-unit.source: Unbound links, which create table action links outside a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 未绑定的链接，用于创建外部的数据绑定控件的表操作链接。

trans-unit.source: An example of these links is in the Insert link in the List.aspx page template of a Dynamic Data Web site.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接的一个示例是中的动态数据网站 List.aspx 页面模板中的插入链接。

trans-unit.source: Because these links are not part of a data-bound control that has a defined data context, you must specify the table to access and the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: 由于这些链接不是具有定义的数据上下文的数据绑定控件的一部分，你必须指定的表访问和要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: If you specify "Edit" or "Details" as the action, you must also provide the primary key.
trans-unit.target: 如果为操作指定"的编辑"或"详细信息"，你还必须提供为主键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink> control supports additional markup attributes then can be forwarded to the routing engine when the link is activated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink>控制支持附加标记特性，则可以将其转发到路由引擎时链接被激活。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when you want to have an item-specific link from a non-data-bound context.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要从非数据绑定上下文的特定项的链接时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Scaffolding Dynamic Data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914).
trans-unit.target: 具有源代码的 Visual Studio 项目是用本主题可以附带：[基架动态数据](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914)。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to create <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink> controls for data rows, for a collection, and to perform the specified action.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink>数据行，为一个集合，并执行指定的操作的控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that is associated with the link.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与链接关联的操作。

trans-unit.source: The action that is associated with the link.
trans-unit.target: 与链接关联的操作。

trans-unit.source: The predefined values that you can assign to this property are "Edit", "Insert", "List", and "Details".
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其分配给此属性的预定义的值有"编辑"、"插入"、"列表"和"详细信息"。

trans-unit.source: Each of these values is associated with a page template.
trans-unit.target: 其中每个值都与一个网页模板相关联。

trans-unit.source: You can also assign custom values.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以分配自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Custom values must be supported by custom page templates.
trans-unit.target: 必须由自定义页模板支持自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data context for the data model that the link applies to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置链接所适用的数据模型的数据上下文。

trans-unit.source: The data context that applies to the link.
trans-unit.target: 适用于链接的数据上下文。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink> control is used in a data-bound control, the default value is the same as the one that is used by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink>控件使用数据绑定控件中，默认值为一个数据绑定控件使用相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the link display text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置链接显示文本。

trans-unit.source: The link display text.
trans-unit.target: 链接显示文本。

trans-unit.source: If the link display text is empty, the default display `string` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果链接显示文本为空，默认显示`string`使用。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink> control that it should perform any logic for binding data.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通知<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink>控制，它应执行的任何逻辑，用于将数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the table and data context during data binding.
trans-unit.target: 已尝试在数据绑定过程中设置表和数据上下文。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An attempt has been made to bind to a <see langword="null" /> data field.
trans-unit.target: 已尝试绑定到 <see langword="null" /> 数据字段。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink> control that it should perform any necessary pre-rendering steps before the control saves view state and renders content.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通知<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink>它应执行任何必要的预呈现的控件步骤之前控件保存视图状态和呈现内容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> object cannot determine the data table to link to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> 对象不能确定要链接的数据表格。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified attribute that is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 检索应用于 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> 控件的指定特性的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified attribute that is applied to the link.
trans-unit.target: 应用于链接的指定特性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 属性名。

trans-unit.source: The value that is assigned to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 赋给特性的值。

trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute and its value to apply to the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 定义要应用于 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicHyperLink" /> 控件的特性及其值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the table for the link action.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置链接操作的表。

trans-unit.source: The name of the table for the link action.
trans-unit.target: 链接操作的表的名称。
